name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Microsoft Graph
description: This is a repository of microsoft graph APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Microsoft Graph
apis.description: Microsoft Graph exposes multiple APIs from Office 365 and other Microsoft cloud services through a single endpoint. Microsoft Graph simplifies queries that would otherwise be more complex. You can use Microsoft Graph to: Access data from multiple Microsoft cloud services, including Azure Active Directory, Exchange Online as part of Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive, OneNote, and Planner.
